- Ở Rönnvik. - Chắc chắn rồi.

en: Ja sen isän mä vast muistankin hyvin.

en: No joo. Mut mä pääsin sielt pois.
pa: Well, I got out of there.
vi: Tôi đã thoát khỏi đó.

en: Sit tuli tää uus ahdistelutapaus kuus vuotta sitten.
pa: You filed a report about stalking six years ago.

pa: I wanted that freak sentenced, but it was settled out of court.

en: Mä halusin sille friikille tuomion, mut se meni sovitteluun.

vi: Hắn đã làm gì?

pa: I'm sure he broke into my home, but no one ever believed me.

pa: He was ordered to get help, but it didn't do anything.
vi: Hắn được yêu cầu đi điều trị, nhưng không ích gì.

Lähetteli kukkia viel 3 vuotta sen jälkeen.

 Yes, I am.

pa: -I was leaving. -You can go out through my house.

pa: You should wake up to reality.
